properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 2:52PM MST until January 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12
inches, except 1 to 3 inches at lower elevations.

* WHERE...Southern Rocky Mountain Front.

* WHEN...From 5 AM Sunday to 5 PM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas
of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The
dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could
cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Increased avalanche danger is possible for
those in the backcountry and on steep terrain.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SUNDAY TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
